p: The sections (5 μm) on slides were immersed in xylene (3 min, twice), and rehydrated in a decreasing ethanol series diluted in distilled water (100%, 100%, 95%, 95%, 75%, 0%, 1 min each). The sections were rinsed in water, stained in hematoxylin for 45 s, and rinsed in water. After the staining, sections were air-dried in room and mounted using Permount™ Mounting Medium.
